description:
You can ask anything with our Chatbot app and get accurate, mind-blowing faster responses. Our AI Chat is always ready to help with any specific topic.

A few key features:
     - Powered by GPT-4, GPT-4o, GPT-3.5, Grok AI, Google Gemini
     - Turn any Photo to Anime Style Cartoon
     - Realtime Search Assistant
     - Generate AI Images
     - Can understand any images
     - Voice interaction. 
     - Document Scanning
     - Web site summarize
     - Smart AI Keyboard
     - A large number of useful Prompts
     - Social media caption inspired by any image
     - Essay / Email / Tweet / LinkedIn / Vlog
     - Paragraph / Poem / Writer / Song / Joke / Recipe
     - Translate / Solve Grammarly Error / Summarize Book / Summarize Text
     - Solve Math / Science Question / Write code 

more and more coming soon!


No Need Sign Up. With the ChatGPT's powered Chatbot, you can talk to a highly intelligent AI Chatbot that can understand and respond to your queries in real-time better than most chatbots nowadays.

Privacy: https://sites.google.com/view/ai-chat-ai-chatbot-keyboard/privacy-policy-terms-and-condition
Terms: https://sites.google.com/view/ai-chat-ai-chatbot-keyboard/privacy-policy-terms-and-condition

Welcome to Chat & Ask AI by Codeway – Discover endless possibilities every day!

Experience chatting with an AI that understands you, adapts to your mood, and personalizes conversations, making each interaction unique.

ASK ANYTHING, ANYTIME:
Curious what chatting with historical figures or business gurus would be like? Chat & Ask AI makes these fascinating conversations possible, right from your phone. You can ask for recommendations, get inspired, or learn something new.

AI ASSISTANTS FOR ANY TASK:
Need expert help? The app includes a variety of smart AI assistants that specialize in different fields — from creative writers and logo designers to business planners, fitness coaches, and more. Whatever you’re working on, there’s an assistant ready to support you.

IMAGE GENERATION AND EXPLORATION:

Be Your Own Artist: Use AI image generation to imagine a scene or describe a place you’ve never been. Our AI turns your ideas into beautiful pictures. Create book covers, social media posts, postcards and more.
Learn About Your World Through Images: Snap a photo of anything around you —buildings, art, or landscapes— and get instant info about it using image input technology.
ENHANCED TEXT GENERATOR FOR EASY WRITING HELP:
Our AI-powered writing assistant can help you generate ideas, write outlines, and even compose long paragraphs. Tackle any writing task with ease. Get creative whether you’re composing a song, writing a story for your kids, a post for your blog, or an email.

SIMPLE WEB SEARCH:
Tell our AI what you’re interested in, whether it’s the latest tech, fashion trends, or health tips, and get all the current info you need.

FUN LANGUAGE LEARNING AND HOMEWORK HELPER:

Language Practice: Learn Japanese through a samurai adventure or Spanish while running a virtual restaurant. AI makes learning new languages exciting and practical.
Academic Support: Stuck on a problem? Use Chat & Ask AI as your homework helper to guide you through school assignments in any subject.
SMART SUMMARY ASSISTANT:

Quick Summaries: Get the key points of long videos or complex documents in a fun, interactive way.
Ask Questions: Upload a document, paste a web link of an article or a video, then ask whatever you are curious about and get answers instantly.
Chat & Ask AI by Codeway isn’t just an app—it’s your gateway to a more informed, imaginative, and interactive life.

Download Chat & Ask AI now and start exploring a world of possibilities!








Privacy Policy:  https://static.askaichat.app/privacy-en.html
Terms of Use: https://static.askaichat.app/terms-conditions-en.html
